title: #055: 5 Things I’m Focusing On This Month
itunes:title: #055: 5 Things I’m Focusing On This Month
description:
After eleven days of travel, I’m finally back home and reflecting on how I want to bring more grounded energy into my life. I love new months, and this month of April perfectly coincided with this strong desire I had to set my intentions for the month.

In this episode I share it all when it comes to both personal *and* business goals - and it’s a good one to listen to if you’re ready to start your month feeling inspired & ready to claim your intentions and focus!
